data.title: MLB The Show 24 List of Generic Stances/Motions
meta_keywords: MLB The Show 24 List of Generic Stances/Motions
data.meta_description: Doing my annual list of batting stances and pitching motions not listed by name for the 12th game in a row. As always, the list is roughly 90-95% done
data.text:
MVP

OVR: 6

Join Date: Sep 2009

MLB The Show 24 List of Generic Stances/Motions

Doing my annual list of batting stances and pitching motions not listed by name for the 12th game in a row. As always, the list is roughly 90-95% done as there are some I need help figuring out. I'll update the post throughout the year. Enjoy!
